title: Humanise Project
description: A research group that aims to refine teleoperations in outer space through technological and psychological studies. As the robotics software engineer, I regret to inform you that our code is proprietary üòê. Reach out on LinkedIn for more information!

fallback.title: impostor2bot
fallback.description: An Among Us Discord bot that allows a user to create a session in a voice channel, muting and unmuting everyone based on the user's self-mute state.

fallback.title: assembly
fallback.description: A select collection of my assembly projects, including a Brainfuck interpreter.

title: It's Always Sunny on Mount Olympus
description: An in-house theater play script written by the writing team of DWH-UPstage, of which I am the head writer. The play tells the story of a group of Greek gods seeking to reconcile Zeus with reason. A parody of the sitcom "It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia."

title: O Captain! My Captain!
description: A story about Philip Watton, an engineer living in New London from the fictional universe of Frostpunk. The story is about his struggles to grant long-lost technology to the people under the pressure of an authoritarian regime that feels threatened by his breakthrough.
